title: Installation Optimise For Chinese Users Who Behind the Wall
body_html: As you know, we are just can not access all Google etc access behind the f*k great wall. The pytorch.org wesite can not load properly when click pip and cuda chips. Just not responding, I think the site using some access which block in China. Just for suggestion, write more install command in Github README.md or anywhere else.
